```{r}
library(fields)
color = two.colors(n = 5, start="forestgreen", end="midnightblue", middle = "mediumturquoise" )
alpha = seq(0.2, 1, length.out=10)
allcols <- expand.grid(color=as.character(color), alpha=alpha)
locs <- expand.grid(x=seq(-1,1, length.out=5),
                    y = seq(-1, 1, length.out=10))

par(mar=c(0,0,0,0))
for (i in 1:nrow(locs)){
  if (i ==1){
    plot(locs$x[i], locs$y[i], col=adjustcolor(allcols$color[i], allcols$alpha[i]), xaxt="n", yaxt="n", xlab="", ylab="", bty="n", cex=5, pch=20, xlim=c(-1,1), ylim=c(-1,1))
  }else{
    points(locs$x[i], locs$y[i], col=adjustcolor(allcols$color[i], allcols$alpha[i]), pch=20, cex=5)
    
  }
}

```
